name: REP-HIT LD47
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 47. Theme: "Stuck in a Loop".

Keep bouncing between portals and shoot yourself. Made for Ludum Dare 47 - "Stuck in a Loop"

Click - Place portals, the portal with the same color of the world is the next portal you are gonna move.

Esc - Pause.

R - Restart.
